Gallery Media Medias Morec Selections Selection Share to... Deleting. Please, wait. Medias excluded. Something has fail. We soo sorry. Delete Are you sure about it? file will be excluded. files will be excluded. Do you really wanna delete all medias from Cancel Close Images New folder Move files Please select the destiny folder or create one. Are you sure? Move files to archive has been moved to archive(s) has been moved to Move Moving... Allow access Please allow Infinity Gallery to read your medias. Set as: This functions needs a image. New folder Enter with folder´s name. Move to new folder Details Directory: Options Edit photo Set as wallpaper Please enter with valid carcters Ignore Ignore? Do you really wanna hide this folder? It wont be exclude, but will not be showed in the gallery (unless you undo it on "Options")
Archives: Size: Date: Width: Height: Duration: Data precision: Created: Last modification: Unknow Factory: Model: Exposure time: ISO: Focal: Flash: Aperture: Brightness:
Folders Recent Files Hidden folders Path: Remove from hiddens Do you really want to show this folder: Behavior Show Original folder Now the folder will be acessible by the gallery. Something wrong happens. Try again. You have no hidden folder. To hidden some folder, get back to the main screen and press and hold a folder. Then, choose hide, set the correct path and finally hide the folder. has been hidden. You can`t back this folder. Dark theme Do you want to active the dark theme? Recents Do you want to see all gallery medias on recent list? The modifications will be apply when you get back to the main screen. Raw files RAW are pure image files, that is, without treatments or quality loss. Such loss may be caused due to conversion and / or compression. Do you wanna load these? RAW are pure image files, that is, without treatments or quality loss. Such loss may be caused due to conversion and / or compression. For this reason, the files may take some time to load. \n You can choose not to load them on the behavior options menu. Change New folder path Choose the folder`s name which new folders will be created within. Please try without special characters. Some thing wrong happens. Try again. Save Change Done This folder was not scanned by Android. Because this, only this media will be showed. Scan now
Moving Wait while your media files has being moved.
Fullscreen Do you want to show gallery in fullscreen?
New Folder´s style The new folder design is clearer and simpler than the previous one, but it no longer has an image preview list, and this allows Infinity Gallery to make better use of the phone memory.
Folder´s grid Show folders list as a grid with two columns?
High quality images Choose the image`s quality. Attention, better quality may cause application slowness. Also, this option is not as relevant(not recommended) from the Android Oreo. This option can cause high memory usage and application slowness. Low (Recommended) Medium High
Welcome! \u00A0\u00A0This is the Infinity Gallery! Now you can access your images and media from a quick and easy way into a beautiful application. \n\u00A0\u00A0The Infinity Gallery, besides being beautiful and organized, gives gesture support (swipe right to return to the previous screen), customize app design (go to the `Behavior´ menu in `Options´), edit your photos and more! \n \n Thank you, \n Infinity Gallery. Welcome to the new version of Infinity Gallery! News: \n - New recents list behavior. \n - Improved application behavior and processing speed.
Let´s go!
Contrast Brightness Photo editor Edited Red Blue Green Are you want to exit without saving image? Discard Saving... Cut Cancel Image Saved Successfully on Failed to save Image
Applying... Gray scale Relief Neon Avarage blur Pixelate TV Invert Block Old Light Lomo HDR Soft glow Gaussian blur Sketch Gotham None Do you really want undo all your changes? Yes
\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0Special thanks to OnePlus Brasil and Manolos da Sançung. You can find they by clicking below. Facebook Group

Allow delete Now Android asks for permission to allow any application to delete files.\n\nDon`t worry, it`s easy!\nInfinity Gallery will guide you to a new screen. Over there, just follow these steps bellow: 1º step 2º step Find the Infinity Gallery, then click it. Turn on the switch, just like the image bellow. Then, get back here!
